summary: Full ebony armor and weapon texture replacement.   Features darker, but not black, armor with less noticeable gold trim, with an oily sheen.
descriptionHtml:
Only on Nexus

Ole Man Winter\'s 
EBONY TEXTURE REPLACER
_________________________________________________

VERSION 2.0
*4 armor sets are now included.
*View ARMOR_COMPARE.jpg to select your preference.
*Added minimal oil sheen to shield to better match weapon set

*NOTE: There is only one version of the weapons, but EACH ARMOR PACK CONTAINS AN IDENTICAL WEAPONS TEXTURE PACK.
*NOTE: Instal from scratch to update from version 1.  Overwrite all.

* EBONY MAIL NOTE *  The 4 texture variations are not perfected for this armor.  They do exist, but need edited for version 3.0  They are reacting differently to same editing I was applying to all the sets.  I will fix the problem asap.
_________________________________________________

This texture pack should offer an alternative between the vanilla ebony and a few existing retexture mods.

All ebony weapons and armor have been retextured to be darker than vanilla (but not pitch black like another version on nexus) and with less gold trim than vanilla (and MUCH LESS gold trim than another nexus version).  This ebony set also has a slight oily sheen*
* MULTIPLE VERSIONS NOW AVAILABLE.


Notes:
This is my first mod since the days of Morrowind.  I hope a few people enjoy it. Please endorse it if you do.
Thanks!

Install:
1) Unrar file
2) View ARMOR_COMPARE.jpg to select your armor style preference
3) Unpack ONLY the corresponding \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim directory
	* Identical weapons are included in each armor version pack.
author: olemanwinter
